name: The Final Stand (itch) (The Chicken Dev)
description:
The Final Stand is a survival game where your goal is to survive as many day as you can with the help of your surrounding. mine and craft, do everything you want to defeat your enemy.

Keep in mind that the project is in development and some things will be added or removed, you may as well encounter some bugs during your playtrought you can report them by commenting in the community section.
